verses.text: \w My|strong="H5921"\w* cry goes \w to|strong="H5921"\w* God! Indeed, \w I|strong="H5921"\w* cry \w to|strong="H5921"\w* God \w for|strong="H5921"\w* help, \w and|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* listen \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w In|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H6963"\w* day \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w my|strong="H6963"\w* trouble \w I|strong="H6963"\w* sought \w the|strong="H6963"\w* Lord. \w My|strong="H6963"\w* hand \w was|strong="H6963"\w* stretched \w out|strong="H6817"\w* \w in|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H6963"\w* night, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* didn’t get tired. \w My|strong="H6963"\w* soul refused \w to|strong="H6963"\w* \w be|strong="H6963"\w* comforted.

\w I|strong="H3117"\w* remember \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* groan. \w I|strong="H3117"\w* complain, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H3027"\w* \w spirit|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* overwhelmed. \qs Selah.\qs*

\w You|strong="H2142"\w* \w hold|strong="H2142"\w* \w my|strong="H2142"\w* eyelids open. \w I|strong="H7878"\w* am \w so|strong="H7307"\w* \w troubled|strong="H1993"\w* \w that|strong="H2142"\w* \w I|strong="H7878"\w* \w can|strong="H7307"\w*’t \w speak|strong="H7878"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* considered \w the|strong="H1696"\w* days \w of|strong="H5869"\w* old, \w the|strong="H1696"\w* years \w of|strong="H5869"\w* ancient \w times|strong="H6470"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3117"\w* remember \w my|strong="H2803"\w* song \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* night. \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w consider|strong="H2803"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w my|strong="H2803"\w* \w own|strong="H5769"\w* heart; \w my|strong="H2803"\w* spirit diligently enquires:
“\w Will|strong="H7307"\w* \w the|strong="H2142"\w* Lord reject \w us|strong="H2142"\w* forever? \w Will|strong="H7307"\w* \w he|strong="H7307"\w* \w be|strong="H7307"\w* favourable no more?

Has \w his|strong="H3808"\w* loving kindness vanished \w forever|strong="H5769"\w*? \w Does|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* promise \w fail|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H2186"\w* generations?
\w Has|strong="H5331"\w* God forgotten \w to|strong="H1755"\w* \w be|strong="H5331"\w* gracious? \w Has|strong="H5331"\w* he, \w in|strong="H1755"\w* anger, withheld his compassion?” \qs Selah.\qs*
Then I thought, “I will appeal \w to|strong="H7911"\w* this: \w the|strong="H7911"\w* years of \w the|strong="H7911"\w* right hand of \w the|strong="H7911"\w* Most High.”

\w I|strong="H8141"\w* \w will|strong="H1931"\w* remember \w the|strong="H8141"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s deeds; \w for|strong="H8141"\w* \w I|strong="H8141"\w* \w will|strong="H1931"\w* remember \w your|strong="H2470"\w* wonders \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H8141"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3588"\w* \w also|strong="H3588"\w* meditate \w on|strong="H6924"\w* all \w your|strong="H3588"\w* work, \w and|strong="H2142"\w* \w consider|strong="H2142"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w doings|strong="H4611"\w*.

\w Your|strong="H3605"\w* \w way|strong="H3605"\w*, God, \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sanctuary. \w What|strong="H6467"\w* god \w is|strong="H3605"\w* great \w like|strong="H1897"\w* God?

\w You|strong="H1870"\w* \w are|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w God|strong="H4310"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* does wonders. \w You|strong="H1870"\w* \w have|strong="H6944"\w* made \w your|strong="H1870"\w* strength known amongst \w the|strong="H1870"\w* peoples.

\w You|strong="H6213"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* redeemed \w your|strong="H3045"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w your|strong="H3045"\w* arm, \w the|strong="H6213"\w* sons \w of|strong="H5971"\w* Jacob \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H5971"\w*. \qs Selah.\qs*

\w The|strong="H1121"\w* waters \w saw|strong="H3290"\w* \w you|strong="H5971"\w*, God. \w The|strong="H1121"\w* waters \w saw|strong="H3290"\w* \w you|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H5971"\w* writhed. \w The|strong="H1121"\w* depths \w also|strong="H1121"\w* convulsed.

\w The|strong="H7200"\w* clouds poured \w out|strong="H7200"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*. \w The|strong="H7200"\w* skies resounded \w with|strong="H4325"\w* thunder. \w Your|strong="H7200"\w* arrows also flashed around.

\w The|strong="H5414"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w thunder|strong="H6963"\w* \w was|strong="H6963"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* whirlwind. \w The|strong="H5414"\w* lightnings lit \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* world. \w The|strong="H5414"\w* earth trembled \w and|strong="H1980"\w* shook.

Your way \w was|strong="H6963"\w* \w through|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H6963"\w* sea, your paths \w through|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H6963"\w* great waters. Your footsteps \w were|strong="H8398"\w* not known.

\w You|strong="H3045"\w* led \w your|strong="H3045"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w* \w like|strong="H1870"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* flock, \w by|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* hand \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w Moses|strong="H3808"\w* \w and|strong="H1870"\w* Aaron.
